conversations.body_text: Hi Femapisa,  May I ask which country you are located in?

Hi!
I'm from Portugal.

I'm interested in several items besides the pedals if the price doesn't
exceed much what's on the website, hence my question in the last message.

Thank you.
Regards
Fernando Santos


service@simsonn.com

Hi!
Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback

If there is no response from you, there will be no purchase.

Thank you
Best Regards

Femapisa <photolyticell@gmail.com> escreveu em qua., 7/01/2026 às 12:24 :

> Hi!
> I'm from Portugal.
>
> I'm interested in several items besides the pedals if the price doesn't
> exceed much what's on the website, hence my question in the last message.
>
> Thank you.
> Regards
> Fernando Santos
>
>
> service@simsonn.com

Hi Femapisa,     The pedals will be shipped from Germany, so there will be no customs duties. Regarding shipping costs, the system will automatically calculate them when you place your order.  Thank you for your inquiry. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us anytime. We will respond as soon as possible.
